sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {ChakraProvider, Box, Flex, Text, Container, Stack, Spacer, Center } from '@chakra-ui/react'

const Menu = () => {
    const sticky = {
        position: "-webkit-sticky", /* Safari */
        position: "sticky",
        top: "0"
    };

    return (
        <ChakraProvider>
            <Box w="300px" h="100vh" style={sticky}>
                <Stack direction="column" spacing="35px" mt="5px">
                    <Box h="40px" bg="tomato">
                        <Box w="40px" h="40px" bg="blue.500" borderRadius="100%"> 
                            <Center>
                                <Box w="25px" h="25px" bg="white" mt="5px"></Box>
                            </Center>
                        </Box>
                    </Box>
                    <Box h="35px" >
                        <Stack direction="row">
                            <Box w="25px" h="25px" bg="#1DA1F2" mt="5px">
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text ml="25px" mt="3px" fontSize="19px" fontWeight="bold" color="#1DA1F2">Home</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box h="35px" >
                        <Stack direction="row">
                            <Box w="25px" h="25px" bg="white" mt="5px">
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text ml="25px" mt="3px" fontSize="19px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">Explore</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box h="35px" >
                        <Stack direction="row">
                            <Box w="25px" h="25px" bg="white" mt="5px">
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text ml="25px" mt="3px" fontSize="19px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">Notifications</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box h="35px" >
                        <Stack direction="row">
                            <Box w="25px" h="25px" bg="white" mt="5px">
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text ml="25px" mt="3px" fontSize="19px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">Messages</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box h="35px" >
                        <Stack direction="row">
                            <Box w="25px" h="25px" bg="white" mt="5px">
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text ml="25px" mt="3px" fontSize="19px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">Bookmarks</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box h="35px" >
                        <Stack direction="row">
                            <Box w="25px" h="25px" bg="white" mt="5px">
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text ml="25px" mt="3px" fontSize="19px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">List</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box h="35px" >
                        <Stack direction="row">
                            <Box w="25px" h="25px" bg="white" mt="5px">
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text ml="25px" mt="3px" fontSize="19px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">Profile</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box h="35px" >
                        <Stack direction="row">
                            <Box w="25px" h="25px" bg="white" mt="5px">
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text ml="25px" mt="3px" fontSize="19px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">More</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box h="50px">
                        <Box as="button" w="230px" h="50px" bg="#1DA1F2" borderRadius="22px" _hover={{ bg: "#1A90D9" }}>
                            <Text fontSize="15px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">Tweet</Text>
                        </Box>
                    </Box>
                    <Box>
                        <Box h="40px" mt="240px">
                            <Stack direction="row">
                                <Box>
                                    <Box w="40px" h="40px" bg="gray.50" borderRadius="100%" ml="10px"/>
                                </Box>
                                <Box>
                                    <Stack direction="row" spacing="55px">
                                        <Box>
                                            <Stack direction="column" spacing="-5px">
                                                <Text fontSize="15px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">MK Rabbani</Text>
                                                <Text fontSize="15px" color="#8899A6">@mkrabbani97</Text>
                                            </Stack>
                                        </Box>
                                        <Spacer />
                                        <Box>
                                            <Box w="17px" h="5px" bg="tomato" mt="15px"/>
                                        </Box>
                                    </Stack>
                                </Box>
                            </Stack>
                        </Box>
                    </Box>
                </Stack>
            </Box>
        </ChakraProvider>
    )
}

export default Menu
